title: How did colonists respond to the Stamp Act? - Quora

response.answer_text: There were debates in colonial legislatures, a variety of documents and petitions written and the tax collectors were harshly treated my mob elements, such as the Sons of Liberty.

If assassin creed can be seen as a legitimate source (my view ish) they protested. Then a shot war fired (in assassin creed by a templer in reality probably a soldier or protestor) and I’m, guessing that started a riot (the character runs off before he get’s blamed).
